faceduck.skeleton.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • faceduck.skeleton.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful utilities, currently focused on randomization. We use a fixed seed so that simulations are repeatable.

      • randomEmptyLoc

        public static Location randomEmptyLoc(World world)
        Finds a random empty location in world.
        Parameters:
